grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 拭浄【ショクジョウ】wiping and purifying, wiping and cleansing
払拭【フッショク】wiping out, sweeping away, eradicating, dispelling
清拭【セイシキ】bed bath, sponge bath, blanket bath, toilet
払拭【フッショク】wiping out, sweeping away, eradicating, dispelling
清拭【セイシキ】bed bath, sponge bath, blanket bath, toilet
kun reading compounds: 拭う【ぬぐう】to wipe, to mop up, to get rid of (an impression, feeling, blemish, etc.), to dispel (e.g. shame), to erase, to remove
拭く【ふく】to wipe, to dry
